Seize the opportunity to enjoy all services from A to Z from product concept, package, and branding.

title.title: Sample making guide
title.subtitle: nutri 3.3 sample service
title.titledesc: Make the health functional core food sample you want in nutri 3.3!
title.titledesc1: It can be produced at a sampling cost of $270 (VAT included) per one time.
title.text: *Sample service is a paid service, and it usually takes 3 weeks for delivery after payment is completed.

sampleprocress.title: Sample service process
sampleprocress.desc1: Request for sample production on your desired sample from my choice in nutri 3.3.
sampleprocress.desc_sub: Sample production costs $270 / Additional modifications are charged separately
sampleprocress.desc2: We check your requirements based on the sample service requested.
sampleprocress.desc3: We develop samples based on the requested information.
sampleprocress.desc4: We produce samples after product development
sampleprocress.desc5: The finished sample will be shipped to your address.

sampleFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sampleFaq.ques1: How long does sample production take?
sampleFaq.ans1: Usually takes about 3 weeks after payment is completed, but it may varies by product.
sampleFaq.ques2: What is the volume and quantity of samples provided?
sampleFaq.ans2: Sample quantity offered is as follows: * Tablets: 30T / Capsules: 30C / Packets: 10 Packs

service.title: Easy & handy dry manufacturing navigation
service.subtitle: nutri 3.3 service
service.rule1_content: We offer products that are ready for immediate launch.Create a product easily with full package service, including product concept, package, and branding.
service.rule2_content: This is a recommended recipe for those who have difficulty choosing the ingredients in the form of semi-finished products consisting of ingredients and formulations suitable for their function. You can choose from 'my choice' menu.
service.rule3_content: It is a service that allows you to make your own products with the ingredients, formulations, and packages you choose yourself.
service.rule4_content: We offer a free estimate (expected) service for the production of your own health functional food combined as you want.
service.rule5_content: We offer you an opportunity to make a sample of your own health functional food. (Fee: $270 / once)
